wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I, of course, am thrilled that Harry has joined the marketing team. I am also thrilled that Tanya has joined the team and started a blog. Now, I can just sit back and cook up insane marketing schemes that will require Super Bowl ads, mascots, a dedicated 747 jet, and frequent trips to New York and LA to meet with media and show biz people. The team will be taking all future marketing meetings from the Chateau Marmont. Yhea, the slime live well....
